title: VlogunrealPromo marketing site + promo-video request form (frontend)

requirements.summary: Build a responsive English marketing website branded as “VlogunrealPromo” for AI promo videos targeting Restaurants/Hotels/etc.
acceptanceCriteria: The site prominently displays the name “VlogunrealPromo”.
The site clearly communicates that the service is AI promotional videos for Restaurants/Hotels/etc.
All user-facing UI text is in English.

file_operations.description: Create the main marketing page layout with header + sections that prominently display “VlogunrealPromo” and clearly describe the AI promo video service for Restaurants/Hotels/etc.
Ensure the document title/metadata aligns with the VlogunrealPromo brand and English-only presentation.

requirements.summary: Implement core marketing sections with navigation and clear CTAs to request a promo video.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation provides access (via sections or routes) to Services, Industries, How it works, Pricing, Examples, FAQ, and Contact/Request.
Each section has clear headings and concise explanatory copy in English.
A clear CTA (e.g., “Request a Promo Video”) is visible above the fold and near the bottom of the page.

file_operations.description: Add and wire the required sections (Hero, Services/What you get, Industries, How it works, Pricing, Examples, FAQ, Contact/Request) using in-page anchors and a top navigation; include primary CTA above the fold and a secondary CTA near the bottom. Where appropriate, compose shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card, Accordion) to keep section UI consistent. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a responsive header with brand wordmark/logo, in-page navigation links to all required sections, and a prominent “Request a Promo Video” CTA button using shadcn-ui Button. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a small reusable section wrapper (id/anchor support, consistent spacing, max-width container) to keep typography and spacing cohesive across all required sections.

requirements.summary: Create a “Request a Promo Video” form with all required fields, client-side validation, and a success confirmation displaying a reference ID.
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all specified fields.
Client-side validation blocks submission when required fields are missing or invalid (e.g., email format).
On success, the UI shows a clear confirmation message and a submission/reference ID.

file_operations.description: Implement the full lead form with fields: business name, business type (Restaurant/Hotel/Other), contact name, email, phone/WhatsApp, location (city/country), website/social links, desired video length, desired style/mood, language, deadline (date), budget range, and free-text notes. Add client-side validation (required fields, email format, basic phone/WhatsApp sanity). Compose shadcn-ui form building blocks (Input, Textarea, Select, Button, Card, etc.) without editing immutable ui paths. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a confirmation panel shown on successful submission that clearly states the request was received and displays the reference ID (with copy-to-clipboard UX if appropriate). Compose shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Button) for styling consistency. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the RequestPromoVideoForm into the Hero CTA (scroll/focus to form) and into the Contact/Request section; render RequestConfirmation on success.

requirements.summary: Connect form submission to the backend actor using React Query for loading/success/error states and display the reference ID on success.
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the form calls the backend create-request method.
While submitting, the UI shows a loading state and prevents duplicate submissions.
On error, the UI shows an English error message and allows retry.
On success, the returned reference ID is shown to the user.

file_operations.description: Add a React Query mutation hook that calls the project’s backend actor integration to create a promo-video request. Generate/track a reference ID in the UI flow (as required by the UI confirmation) and manage loading/error/success state for the form.

Use the React Query mutation from useCreatePromoVideoRequest to submit; disable submit while loading to prevent duplicates; show English error messaging with retry; on success show the reference ID via RequestConfirmation. Compose shadcn-ui Alert/Toast patterns if available in the project (without editing immutable ui paths). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Align frontend types used by the form submission flow with the actual backend interface available to the frontend (type-safe actor calls), ensuring the submission wiring compiles cleanly.

requirements.summary: Add an Examples/Portfolio gallery section with responsive thumbnail cards (image, title, short description) showing at least 6 examples.
acceptanceCriteria: Examples section displays at least 6 example cards.
Cards are responsive (grid layout adjusts from mobile to desktop).
Each card includes an image, a title, and a 1–2 line description in English.

file_operations.description: Create a responsive Examples gallery (>=6 cards) using static thumbnail cards (image, title, 1–2 line description) and a grid that adapts from mobile to desktop. Compose shadcn-ui Card components for consistent visuals. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire ExamplesGallery into the required “Examples/Portfolio” section and ensure navigation can jump to it.

requirements.summary: Apply a premium cinematic theme: dark neutrals + warm accents (no blue/purple as primary), modern typography, consistent spacing and components.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme uses a consistent palette dominated by dark neutrals with warm accents (e.g., gold/coral) and does not rely on blue/purple as primary branding.
Typography hierarchy is consistent (headings, body, buttons).
Buttons, cards, and section layouts look cohesive across the site.

file_operations.description: Define global CSS variables/Tailwind base styles for a cinematic dark neutral palette with warm accent colors (avoiding blue/purple as primary), consistent typography scale, and consistent section spacing defaults.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions as needed to support the cinematic palette/typography via existing CSS variable-based tokens and consistent spacing/typography utilities.

Create a layout wrapper to enforce consistent background, container widths, section spacing, and typography styles across all sections; compose shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Button/Card) for cohesive UI patterns. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wrap the page with MarketingLayout and ensure all sections/buttons/cards use the shared theme and typography hierarchy.

requirements.summary: Integrate generated brand images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in header/hero/examples.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are referenced as static assets (not served via backend).
Header/hero includes the logo/wordmark.
Hero uses the hero background image.
Examples gallery uses the provided thumbnail images.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static logo asset at the exact required path so it can be referenced directly by the frontend UI.
Add the generated static wordmark asset at the exact required path so it can be referenced directly by the frontend UI.
Add the generated static hero background asset at the exact required path so it can be referenced directly by the frontend UI.
Add the generated static example thumbnail asset at the exact required path so it can be referenced directly by the Examples gallery UI.
Add the generated static example thumbnail asset at the exact required path so it can be referenced directly by the Examples gallery UI.
Add the generated static example thumbnail asset at the exact required path so it can be referenced directly by the Examples gallery UI.

Reference and render the static generated brand images in the header/hero branding (use frontend/public/assets/generated/vlogunrealpromo-logo.dim_512x512.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/vlogunrealpromo-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Apply the hero background using the static generated asset frontend/public/assets/generated/vlogunrealpromo-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png and ensure it remains readable/accessible with overlays as needed.

Use the provided generated thumbnails for the Examples cards (frontend/public/assets/generated/example-thumb-restaurant.dim_800x450.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/example-thumb-hotel.dim_800x450.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/example-thumb-cafe.dim_800x450.png), and reuse them to reach at least 6 total cards with distinct English titles/descriptions.
